# Pre2.2 Taxonomy Pro-Run (Contract Artifact)

This folder preserves the Pre2.2 taxonomy pro-run output as a versioned
contract artifact for auditability and historical reference.

## What it is
- A verbatim copy of the Pre2.2 taxonomy pro-run output from artifacts.
- Captures the state of the taxonomy output at the time of the run.

## How it is used
- Referenced during contract reviews, regression checks, and migration proofs.
- Used to compare future taxonomy outputs against a known baseline.

## Canonical vs advisory
- The artifact file is canonical and must remain unchanged.
- This README is advisory and may be updated for clarity.
